articles.description: The band will play the first of 41 highly anticipated dates in Cardiff, after a break of 16 years.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Some black market cigarettes, priced at as little as £3, have been found to contain human excrement, dead flies and asbestos. But the trade in them across the country nods to a deeper issue
articles.title: The illegal cigarettes trade in the UK signals a deeper problem

articles.description: A state-of-the-art F-35B has been stranded at Thiruvananthapuram airport for nearly three weeks.

articles.description: The football world is mourning the death of Liverpool and Portugal forward Diogo Jota, aged 28, in a car crash.
